name: shortcuts-mcp
description: MCP server connecting FastMail, Airtable, and AI services for intelligent productivity automation.
long_description:
Connect Claude to your core productivity tools with AI-enhanced automation:

- **Email intelligence** - JMAP-powered FastMail integration with smart filtering and response suggestions
- **Business data sync** - Airtable contact management and project tracking with cross-service updates
- **Privacy-first AI** - Local and cloud AI routing based on content sensitivity
- **Knowledge extraction** - Automatic entity recognition and relationship mapping across services
